title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed
description:
A) Grey ground of stripes and foliage over-printed in design of flowering vine.
B) Similar groudn to A but printed in clusters of natural size rosebuds. 
C) Same groudn effect as A but in blue; pattern over-printed of rose clusters with a birds nest and bird.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller and block printed. 1967-10-21-c.
